name: Puffle Clicker
description:
Puffle Clicker!

This is a random project i have been working on for some time now.

Its sort of like cookie clicker but Club Penguin themed.

SHOUT OUT TO CLUB PENGUIN REWRITTEN: https://cprewritten.net/

They are legends.

Welp with all that said, have fun wasting hours on this random html game!

MODS!

You can technically just replace the images in the images folder with what ever you want so yeah! Mod support!

Not gonna go into it too deep but ofcourse there is the inspect element in your browser and in their is a console so if you know what your doing you can also hack it! (i dont mind if you hack it, you are completely allowed to do whatever you want with this game)
